articles.title: 5 Cars You Can Buy At The Price Of Creta N Line - Times Now
articles.description: The Hyundai Creta N Lne is a brilliant sporty SUV which is loaded with features. Here are 5 cars you can buy at the price of the Hyundai Creta N Line. Hyundai Creta N Line, Skoda Kushaq, Volkswagen Taigun, Kia Seltos, Maruti Suzuki Grand Vitara, Honda Elevate
articles.content: The Hyundai Creta N Line is the sporty version of the already popular Creta compact SUV. It comes with a 1.5L turbo petrol engine which is either paired to a 6-speed manual or a 7-speed DCT transmiss… [+137 chars]
